mapper.select: select sc.company_id as company_id ,sc.company_code as company_code ,sc.company_name_kr as company_name_kr ,sc.company_name_en as company_name_en ,to_char(sc.begin_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as begin_date ,to_char(sc.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date ,sc.user_yn as user_yn ,sc.address_line1 as address_line1 ,sc.address_line2 as address_line2 ,sc.zip_code as zip_code ,sc.email_address as email_address ,sc.telephone_number as telephone_number ,sc.description as description ,sc.create_by as create_by ,to_char(sc.create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_date ,sc.update_by as update_by ,to_char(sc.update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as update_date from sys_company sc where 1=1 order by sc.company_code
